BedBreakfast.description: Large room in hotel standard in charming newly refurbished townhouse in a pedestrian street in Roskilde near Roskilde Cathedral and the city's other attractions.The room have: 1 to 4 beds, TV, Internet, own top modern bathroom, access to large kitchen, estimate large terrace with barbecue and direct view the Cathedral, Large heated outdoor spa on the 2nd floor terrace.
